description:
Lightweight, waterproof boots suited to swift hiking and covering serious ground. Mountain-goating over tricky, uneven terrain? The tuned midsole and flexible heel and forefoot provide a confidence-inspiring degree of sensitivity and trail feel. Grippy and supportive soles give you stability and traction on mud and rock.

  • Uppers are full-grain leather for excellent support, durability and waterproofing
  • GORE-TEX® membrane ensures your feet stay dry during muddy early spring hikes or sudden mid-summer downpours
  • EVA footbed is equal parts comfortable and supportive
  • Lightweight yet durable polyurethane midsole has EVA pods for cushioning and a TPU shank for stability
  • Grippy Vibram® outsoles with XSTrek rubber compound allows for a thinner sole without sacrificing grip or durability
name: Vasque St. Elias FG Gore-Tex Backpacking Boots - Women's
